title: Humor-Integrated Mathematics Instructional Design for Creative TESOL

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targeting general citizens who find math challenging, requiring humor and creative activities to spark interest in mathematics

learning_goals: Learners can explain over 80% of mathematical concepts through humor-based activities
Learners solve everyday mathematical problems with 90% accuracy using creative problem-solving strategies
Learners can create mathematical presentation materials incorporating humor elements in collaborative activities with peers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
